:racehorse: Refactor of closestNodeCameraCoordinates for speed

Refactored the closestNodeCameraCoordinated method to take advantage of parallel streams and the reduce method so that it runs quicker. This is by far the main method that determines responsiveness when zooming in and out of graphs.
